name: HexColour
0:
”Alexa ask Hex Colour, Show me the colour of CCEEDD”
”Show me the colour of D1C7EE”
”Show me the colour of EE0000”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hex colour
des:
Shows the colour of the hexadecimal colour within the alexa skill, whereby comprising of red,green and blue

NOTE: Please pause between each hex value!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
